SuA

Korean: 수아

Height:
5'6" (168 cm)
Group (2012-2020):
FLASHE until Aug 1, 2016

Introduction


SuA (수아), formerly known as Hyewon (혜원), is a South Korean singer. She is a former member of FLASHE, she joined the group for their comeback "Oh, Ye, Yo" and left it in 2016, before the release of "FLASHE Season Album".
